testcase.name: start
testcase.system-out: Test: Start  Test0_Int Scenario is as follows 1.Unlock phone, clear recent apps,Format uSD as Internal mount and Clear internal mount memory 2.Call Image() and Capture Rear camera 25 images with default resolution in internal mount uSD card and Verify the data capture 3.Call Video() and record Rear camera video of first 2 resloutions for 2 minutes of duration in internal mount uSD Card and verify the same 4.Call Format() Format uSD as External mount,Format back to internal mount, Verify with data format status. Setting up the appium desired capabilities  Launch home screen Calling FormatAsInternal() to format uSD card as internal mount Formatting uSD as Internal mount Launch settings application Swipe up and select storage option Select Storage option Clicking on SD card Click more options select storage settings Select format as Internal options Accept Format SD card pop-up Accept move content pop-up Pass: Format as Internal Mount scenario completed Successfull Launch File Manager Application and clear internal memory Select Internal storage Select More options click on Select all Select Delete permanently Pass: Clearing phone internal memory is successfull Calling Image() to capture rear camera image in Internal storage and verifying the same.  Launch Camera Application for Rear picture capture IF Change to uSD card notification pop-up exists select Cancel Option change to SD card element not found : org.openqa.selenium.NoSuchElementException: An element could not be located on the page using the given search parameters.
